title: World awaits threatened attack on Iran
article: Defiant rhetoric in Tehran on Army Day with Iranian president praising military strength and the ‘shattering’ of Israel.
author: Al Jazeera Staff

title: Iran sends drones, missiles towards Israel
article: Iran’s semi-official Tasnim news agency reports that the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps has launched drones and missiles towards Israel.
author: Al Jazeera Staff

title: UN chief says Middle East ‘on the brink’
article: Iran’s ambassador to the UN said its attack on Israel ‘was entirely in the exercise of Iran’s inherent right to self-defence’.
author: Al Jazeera Staff

title: Tesla's Strong Financial Results
article: Tesla has released its latest financial results, which show a significant increase in revenue and profits.
author: David Williams

title: Amazon's Workforce Expansion Plan
article: Amazon has announced a new plan to expand its workforce by 100,000 jobs.
author: Susan Brown

title: Meta's Quarterly Revenue Decline
article: Meta has reported its first quarterly revenue decline since going public in 2012.
author: Michael Miller

title: Supreme Court Reverses Roe v. Wade
article: The Supreme Court has overturned Roe v. Wade, the landmark ruling that legalized abortion nationwide.
author: Jane Doe

title: House Passes Assault Weapons Ban
article: The House of Representatives has passed a bill to ban assault weapons.
author: Peter Jones

title: Senate Confirms Ketanji Brown Jackson
article: The Senate has voted to confirm Ketanji Brown Jackson as the first Black woman to serve on the Supreme Court.
author: Mary Johnson

title: Federal Reserve Raises Interest Rates
article: The Federal Reserve has raised interest rates by 0.75 percentage points in an effort to combat inflation.
author: Elizabeth Jones

title: Google's New AI Chip Announcement
article: Google has announced the development of a new AI chip that is expected to be significantly faster and more efficient than existing chips.
author: William Smith

title: Apple's Latest iPhone Release
article: Apple has released its latest iPhone, which is expected to be available in stores next month.
author: Sarah Williams

title: Microsoft's Partnership with Google
article: Microsoft has announced a new partnership with Google to develop cloud computing solutions.
author: John Smith

title: Elon Musk's Acquisition of Twitter
article: Elon Musk has acquired Twitter for 44 Billion dollars
author: Jane Doe

title: Biden's Climate Plan Announcement
article: President Biden has announced a new plan to address the climate crisis.
author: John Smith
